input.sentences: the family held a masquerade ball for halloween .
the two sisters came with colorful masks .
all family and friends were invited .
the party was lively with drinks served .
the father came dressed as a pirate and enjoyed dancing with the ladies .
output.sentences: A group of girls went to a masquerade party.
The two girls regretted wearing strapless dresses.
A group of girls at the party were gossiping about Tess.
The three girls all wished that they were dating the only guy at the party.
A couple dances for a recital.
